content: This is a small — but important — battle in the fight against systemic misogyny (and with O’Reilly, racism, xenophobia, and so much more hatred). I believe that persistence is the key to strengthening our social fabric to represent all of our people, not just rich, white, heterosexual males who will fight dirty and fight like hell to maintain their stranglehold on the political military industrial entertainment complex. We shall prevail. Thanks to Lisa Bloom, her client Wendy, and all the other victims for standing strong in the face of white male privilege and power.
